QuestionJSON.Question:
Xen is preparing a presentation for their Business Innovation and Technology class. They decide to create a program to catalogue the different tech innovations in the 21st Century. Xen decides to store each innovation as a string in a list. However, they are unsure of how to add items to their list. Here is the part of Xen's code that needs modification:

1List<string> innovations
2// Add here the code to add items to the list
QuestionJSON.Explanation: In Quorum language, to add an item to the list, you should use Add method after the list name. So the correct way to add an item to the list is: innovations:Add('Ebooks')
QuestionJSON.Code_Snippet:
1List<string> innovations
2// Add here the code to add items to the list
